ygData.subject: Re: Random magic duration do you like it? wizard looser?
ygData.msgSnippet: that is the reason i always tell wizards im grouped with to just be patient and save their spells until the creature is past 50% damaged.  i guess if they feel
ygData.messageBody:
that is the reason i always tell wizards im grouped with to just be patient
and save their spells until the creature is past 50% damaged. i guess if
they feel the need to help more they can learn to bandage or something, but
i think a quick finish is really doing thier job and i wouldnt fault them
for it- id just be grateful.


>From: Vincent Archer <Vincent.Archer@...>

>It is also why the creature will quickly stop attacking anyone and jump on
>you :)
>
>(tough lesson, at early level 8. I was "icing" a Sand Scarab, as usual, but
>the Monk I team with forgot at the beginning to click on its auto attack,
>and
>was only using its special attacks. After the 2nd Shock of Ice, the Scarab
>dropped all and ran straight to me... I had to fight it staff to claw, and
>repeatedly attempt to go a spell thru... I managed it, but barely)
>
> > dont give it credit. also, necros have some pretty versatile spells,
>such
> > as dark empathy (healing), dark pact series (gives us more mana- good
>for
> > extended fights), and such. we also get many spells that cannot be
> > resisted.
>
>Necros are combos casters. Nothing they do is impressive in it, but the
>association is a LOT more impressive.
>
>--
